name: Reflection Puzzle - Shoot That Ball - Brain It On!
name_original: Reflection Puzzle - Shoot That Ball - Brain It On!
description:
This game is based on reflection mechanics

Aim is to hit all white object on stage. The angle is key point.

Puzzle lovers will go crazy !!!

Game features:
- Lots of challenging levels;
- addictive gameplay and piano sound effects.
